topic: VIX Jan 19-30 2026 max intraday high forecast
summary: VIX at 14.5, period has FOMC meeting catalyst, mean reversion upward pull. Monte Carlo suggests median max high ~19, with significant right tail.
content: Current VIX: 14.5 (Jan 2 close). Period: Jan 20-30 (9 trading days, Jan 19 MLK Day closed). Key catalysts: FOMC meeting likely Jan 27-28, Q4 earnings season. VIX mean-reversion toward ~19 long-run average. Monte Carlo (100k sims): P10=15.2, P20=16.4, P40=18.3, P50=19.2, P60=20.2, P80=23.0, P90=25.6. Recent 2-week windows show max high / avg close ratio of 1.08-1.16. Late Dec low-vol period had max high of 15.42 on avg close of 14.14.
